凱.definition: (bound form) triumphal music; (Tw) (coll.) generous with money; lavish in spending; chi (Greek letter Χχ)

凱徹.definition: variant of 愷撒|恺撒, Caesar (emperor)

凱恩斯.definition: (name) Keynes; John Maynard Keynes (1883-1946), influential British economist; Cairns, city in Queensland, Australia

凱撒肋雅.definition: Caesarea (town in Israel, between Tel Aviv and Haifa)

凱旋.definition: to return in triumph; to return victorious

凱林賽.definition: keirin cycle race (paced stadium event) (loanword from Japanese 競輪 "keirin")

凱法勞尼亞.definition: Kefalonia, Greek Island in the Ionian sea

凱達格蘭.definition: Ketagalan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan, esp. northeast corner

凱達格蘭族.definition: Ketagalan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan, esp. northeast corner

凱里.definition: Kaili city in Guizhou, capital of Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南苗族侗族自治州|黔东南苗族侗族自治州

凱里市.definition: Kaili city in Guizhou, capital of Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南苗族侗族自治州|黔东南苗族侗族自治州
